name: CatMeow
0:
”Alexa open Cat Meow”
”Alexa ask Cat Meow to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cat meow
des:
This skill is a delight for cat lovers, offering meowing sounds that mimic the presence of a feline friend. Whether you're missing your pet or simply enjoy the comforting sound of cat meows, this skill adds a touch of whimsy and companionship to your day.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Cat Meow
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
